command.name: ignore
command.description: Ignores given user, which prevents you from getting his/her chat messages.

argument.name: user
argument.description: user which should be ignored. You can give user nickname (ie. lakerman), id (ie. 4324) or number (ie. #5). If you skip this argument, current ignore list will be printed

command.remarks: Ignoring a user lasts until map changes or until you explicitely unignore; if you want to ignore user for longer time, you have to repeat this command after every map change.
